Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Well, looks like your wish got granted early even though it's just temporary. How does it feel to join the Ground Forces?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "The mass outbreak of the virus... The front lines probably don't look good if they're recruiting trainees like us...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'You still want to fight on the front lines?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You don't have to be on the front lines to die if the virus reaches the area.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "What would HQ want with us? It's usually Command that contacts us...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "Roger... We'll obey orders and... do as we're told.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "What's wrong, Bruce? You don't look so good.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'We need to position the troops immediately. The outbreak started north of the plains... There are probably quite a lot of civilians trapped.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'HQ wants us to hold the line here, and also to send a rescue team out to the plains.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Are they telling us to go die?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's mission impossible no matter how we look at it!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'From today, I am to be in charge of team Oasis.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'No one can guarantee their own survival in war.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Those mechanic monsters crushed the regular armies like they were nothing! We don't stand a chance!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Even Instructor...! What can we do, at a time like this...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "Well, someone's got to do it. And we can't leave civilians to fend for themselves.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You don't plan on bringing me with you on the rescue mission, do you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Don't think even for a second that I'll let you take all the glory alone.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'Oasis, Bruce, Watanabe, prepare to move out. Our mission, search and rescue.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
